name: test-process-manager
author: Mirco Recknagel
description: Test Process Manager is a full-stack application designed to control and start UI tests through a WebSocket-enabled API.

scripts._comment1: Single Installation Scripts if something breaks, bugs or won't work
scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider npx react-scripts start
scripts._comment2: First Install all Dependencies for each involving project and then run start:all
scripts.install:backend:frontend:test-frameworks: concurrently "npm run install:backend" "npm run install:frontend" "npm run install:dependencies:playwright" "npm run install:dependencies:selenium"
